type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.HierarchicalElement
type.description: * Represents an element which belongs to some hierarchy. * * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getChildren
method.description: * Returns the child elements, or the empty set if there are no child elements. * * @return The child elements, or the empty set if there are no child elements. * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getParent
method.description: * Returns the parent of this element, or {@code null} if there is no parent. * * @return The parent of this element, or {@code null} if there is no parent. * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: children
property.description: * Returns the child elements, or the empty set if there are no child elements. * * @return The child elements, or the empty set if there are no child elements. * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: parent
property.description: * Returns the parent of this element, or {@code null} if there is no parent. * * @return The parent of this element, or {@code null} if there is no parent. * @since 1.0-milestone-5
